results.name: Integer part of Gamma(n+3/10)/Gamma(3/10).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..445
program: vector(21, n, truncate(P(n-1, 3/10)) ) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 13 2019
